conclusion: Preliminary objection partially allowed (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 5-4;No violation of Art. 5-1;No violation of Art. 4;No violation of Art. 3;No violation of Art. 8;No violation of Art. 13;Just satisfaction reserved
docname: CASE OF DE WILDE, OOMS AND VERSYP v. BELGIUM - [Russian Translation]
